Headquarters gun incident: Man who allegedly brandished revolver in front of Leo Molloy granted bail https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/headquarters-gun-incident-man-who-allegedly-brandished-revolver-in-front-of-leo-molloy-granted-bail/CKTDRA7DOZCHJKTCVTHGE2RJMI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/headquarters-gun-incident-man-who-allegedly-brandished-revolver-in-front-of-leo-molloy-granted-bail/CKTDRA7DOZCHJKTCVTHGE2RJMI/ George BlockThe man allegeldy wielded a revolver in the bar and assaulted persons unknown. Northlander Gaelene Bright remembered as ‘joyous’ two years after her murder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlander-gaelene-bright-remembered-as-joyous-two-years-after-her-death/7UY256LKAFBR5P4V3VTYFU2R4U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlander-gaelene-bright-remembered-as-joyous-two-years-after-her-death/7UY256LKAFBR5P4V3VTYFU2R4U/ Denise PiperThe 69-year-old is being remembered with music and dancing in her small town.
